Class IzhNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.IzhNetwork

  • public class IzhNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    A net of Izhikevich neurons.
    Author:
    lana

    • Constructor Detail

      • IzhNetwork

        public IzhNetwork(boolean draw)
        Builds a network with default parameters
        Parameters:
        draw - set true if graphics are necessary (slow)

      • IzhNetwork

        public IzhNetwork(java.lang.String name,
                  boolean draw)
        Parameters:
        name - name for logging
        draw - set true if graphics are necessary (slow)

      • IzhNetwork

        public IzhNetwork(int nn,
                  int ni,
                  double wr,
                  double maxw,
                  double nr,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  boolean draw)
        Parameters:
        nn - total number of neurons
        ni - number of inhibitory neurons
        wr - weights range
        maxw - max weight
        nr - noise range
        name - use if running parallel experiments; set to "" if no name necessary
        draw - set true if graphics are necessary (slow)
